channel.title: Beserker-Pkz! [Torva/Pernix/unicorn horn/brawling gloves/ rares/ so much more!
channel.description:
Added lots of donor awards! Added all new shops! Added all new items! Castle wars! Pestcontrol! Duel-Arena! Bounty hunter! Fully working quests! Secrets that are put around the world! Drop partys! Fully working all skills! Pk rewards! Lots of updates! Great teleports! Corperal beast! Jad! Agrith-Na-Na minigame! Trade in a unicorn horn for 500m very rare! Staff zone! Donator zone! Custom items! Frost Dragons! Almost fully working dungeoneering! 724 Items! Special staff commands! Cool items! New shops New home, no longer varrockk! Lots of dungeons! Fully working all skills! Good summoning interface! [img]http://[IMG]http://i1185.photobucket.com/albums/z347/Codwalkers/newshops.png[/img][/img]
[img]http://[IMG]http://i1185.photobucket.com/albums/z347/Codwalkers/newstuff.png[/img][/img]
[img]http://[IMG]http://i1185.photobucket.com/albums/z347/Codwalkers/donochest.png[/img][/img]
Go here for download and pictures! http://beserkerpkz.webs.com/
jad glitch's fixed working turmoil and other curses working slayer tasks 100% full working vengeance, completionist cape made clan chat jad glitch is fixed added dungeoneering interface in beta currently, i made jad easier to kill so you can get that firecape! :) added ::copy ::xcopy lowered the cost of chaotic's in the tpk shop (Sort of :D) Haha, lots more to come! in-game high-scores Added quests!! Talk to me for admin IN GAME! If there are more than 10 people that have joined you will, as should most, have to apply at our forums BELOW! Also working on Jad WAVES! Adding new things to score board. Donator chest is getting a few more items. Donators are getting more commands. Donators now have premium/gold/and diamond packages. Check prices on our forums. (Very cheap 10-30$) Added Fun-Pk! Added fire pits! Added brawling games, fight your friends for prizes! Like to pk? Go to ::CompetePk! Working clans with clan chat! Finally got done with adventurer's task! Get more info ingame on that! Adding VOTING REWARDS!!! Added voting points! All we need is voting to be put up! Will be up soon! If server is down it is under [u][b]construction![/b][/u] Pick a mode! Uber easy, easy, medium, hard, EXTREME! Effects the amount of xp you get within game! A video will be out soon on this! Youtube channel Codwalkers watch out for it! Fully working slayer! 100% Finally! ;) LOTS MORE STAY TUNED!
Sorry for no pictures. :(
Download NEW AND IMPROVED client here, [url=http://uppit.com/rsdw00wy35v9/Beserker-pkz_client!.rar]uppit.com/rsdw00wy35v9/Beserker-pkz_client!.rar[/url]
The server was down for a short while because of updates, and a vps upload! 24/7 now join today! Fixed client aswell.

item.title: Beserker-Pkz! [Torva/Pernix/unicorn horn/brawling gloves/ rares/ so much more!
item.dc:creator: @codwalkers codwalkers
item.description:
@codwalkers wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:6, topic:469840”]servers offline already =o[/quote] Its not offline, the client was coded wrong from the past owner. I didnt notice until after I released. New release soon so watch out for it. Also my youtube channel codwalkers will have a notice aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: Beserker-Pkz! [Torva/Pernix/unicorn horn/brawling gloves/ rares/ so much more!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Your Developmental Log could use some work. Do you see the difference between this and yours?

Key: SS = Server-sided, CS = Client-sided Developments

Past Updates:

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Combat removed from the Base. (SS)

  • Server contents packaged. (SS)

  • 40 new folders created in total. (SS)

  • Client class reduced to 184K.B. (SS)

  • Added a recreation of the 289 Revision’s Prayer Tab. (CS)

  • Player to Player Trading has been removed. (SS)

  • Text Method optimized for grammar purposes. (SS)

  • New Debugging methods added. (SS/CS)

  • Player to Player Following has been removed. (SS)

  • All Scroll-Bars have been removed. (CS)

  • Magic Tab cleaned out for the Tzhaar Magic Tab. (CS)

  • Potion and other UseItem Packet content has been removed. (SS)

  • Player Death has been removed. (SS)

Read full topic
